metadata.name: Trust
metadata.description:
"Bodies of Light" is a series of miniature nudes captured with a Lytro® Gen 1 light field camera. It is, quite likely, the first and 
- to date - only body of work on the blockchain to have been captured with this camera.                                                                       

"Angel's View" is the premiere collection of images from the series "Bodies of Light". 

Each image in the series is unique. Each image in the collection is of a different model.

attributes.value: 1080 pixels square. Prints at 4 inches or 10 cm square.
Processed JPG extraction from Lytro proprietary image file.
